title: WTB B18's, S81's, L1's and S74's w/Backs

posts.post_title: WTB B18's, S81's, L1's and S74's w/Backs
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy the following:
-B18 Blankets
-S81 Silks except Matty
-L1 Leathers
-S74 White Silks with backs attached
Items must be clean & problem free.
Please send F&B scans with prices to: [url]RBCraik@aol.com[/url] and i will promptly reply.
Thanks!
Bob Craik
